gr.ntua.vision.monitoring.probe
Interface Probe

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public interface Probe
extends java.lang.Runnable

This defines a monitoring probe. Probes require to be invoked in regular intervals, to collect data and provide them to their caller.

Method Summary
 java.util.List<Event> lastCollected()
          get the data this probe collected the last time it Runnable.run().
